text.name: Your goal in #play# is to collect XP and coins in order to develop and decorate your farm.
Welcome to #play#, #name# We would like you to go through the tutorial first to learn the basic steps. You'll get a reward for it! Are you up for it?

Ok then, you don't want the reward… You can go through the tutorial anytime by clicking on the leaf with the question mark. You can find the rules of the game in the help section 'Questions & Answers'. Have fun!
Jeg har akkurat installer Goodgame Gård. Kom å ta en titt på gården min å se hva jeg høster for øyeblikket!

Goodgame Farmer er et flott gårds-simulering tittel ifra Goodgame Studio. Nyt det nydelige livet på landet og forvalt din virtuelle gård. Gro avlinger og tre, ta vare på dyr og tjen mange prestasjoner og oppgraderinger. Utvid og forbedre ditt jordbruk og spill med dine venner fra hele verdenen i dette morsome og søte spillet!

かきくけこきゃきゅきょさしすせそしゃしゅしょたちつてとちゃちゅちょなにぬねのにゃにゅにょはひふへほひゃひゅひょまみむめもみゃみゅみょやゆよらりるれろりゃりゅりょわゐゑをんがぎぐげごぎゃぎゅぎょざじずぜぞじゃじゅじょだぢづでどぢゃぢゅぢょばびぶべぼびゃびゅびょぱぴぷぺぽぴゃぴゅぴょカキクケコキャキュキョサシスセソシャシュショタチツテトチャチュチョナニヌネノニャニュニョハヒフヘホヒャヒュヒョマミムメモミャミュミョヤユヨラリルレロリャリュリョワヱヲヰャヰュヰョンガギグゲゴギャギュギョザジズゼゾジャジュジョダヂヅデドヂャヂュヂョバビブベボビャビュビョパピプペポピャピュピョヰェイィユェイェyeヷヴァヸヴィヴヹヴェヺヴォヴャヴュヴョシェジェチェスァスィスゥスェスォスャスュスョズァズィズゥズェズォズャズュズョツァツィツェツォテァティテゥテェテォテャテュテョデァディデゥデェデォデャデュデョトァトィトゥトェトォドァドィドゥドェドォファフィホゥフェフォフャフュフョリィリェウァウィウゥウェウォウャウュウョクヮクァクィクゥクェクォグヮグァグィグゥグェグォムヮムァムィムゥムェムォヶ
Sorry, your or #name#s friends list is already full,#tab#or #name# has not accepted your friend request.
Please do not constantly write the same text. Thank you!
Please write something meaningful. Thank you!
You can chat freely on the marketplace from level {0} onwards. At all lower levels simply use the predefined sentences.
Invalid e-mail address. Please enter a valid e-mail address.
E-mail address already in use. Please enter a different one.
There are already too many people on that farm. Please chose another farm.
#name# has denied your #job# request or he has left the market place.
The owner of the farm does not have enough money to plow any more fields.
Thank you! An e-mail will be sent to your friend.
You already reached the limit for this object.
For the password please use the following characters: 5 to 15 characters, consisting of#tab# a-z, A-Z, 0-9, -_@
Sorry, #name# has thrown you off their farm!#tab#You have probably done something wrong!?
You need to empty this building before you can sell it.
You need to build a barn or a tool shed in order to store objects.
You won't be able to sell this building, unless you free more room in your storage.
You can only store an empty functional item in a functional item.
Login failure. If you forgot your password, click on 'Lost your password?'.#tab#If you need help, contact us at support@goodgamestudios.com
For the name please use the following characters:#tab#2 to 15 characters, consisting of a-z, A-Z, 0-9, -_
That player name is already taken. Please enter another name or select one:
Please make sure to accept our terms and conditions of use.
You don't have enough job energy for this action. Wait until enough job energy is available or buy some at the store.
Unfortunately, you haven't invited enough friends yet.#tab#To be able to buy #obj# you need to invite #anz# more friends.
I need to register and reach level 1 to chat.
You have used up all #name#. Please buy some more.
You dont have enough fodder to feed all animals!
You have not chosen a gender. Please click on one of the pictures.
There is no storage available for this item.
You don't have enough money for this action.
You used up all your premium seeds #name#. Buy new seeds.
This feature is reserved for registered users.#tab#Please register or the progress on your farm will not be saved.
You don't have enough fuel for this action.
Your {0} is empty. Finish achievements to get more.
Old Version. Please update the page.
You have to be registered and reach level 3 in order to be listed in the ranking.
This player has to reach level 3 to be listed in the ranking.
Sorry, there is no player registered with this name.
You can't chat in fullscreen mode. (This isn't allowed because of security reasons)
Owner of this farm#Owner of this farm
Congratulations! You got the '#name#' - Level #level# achievement.
Amount of Farmdollars spent on gifts.
Number of plow jobs done with the old job permission system
Number of harvest jobs done with the old job permission system
Number of plow jobs issued with the old job permission system
Number of harvest jobs issued with the old job permission system
Number of fields, animals and trees fertilized: Time advantage
Number of fields, animals and trees fertilized: Magic wand
Number of different premium seeds harvested
Number of plowed fields during a plow job
Number of fields that have been plowed during plow jobs issued on your farm
Number of fields, trees or animals harvested during a harvest job
Number of fields, trees and animals that have been harvested during harvest jobs issued on your farm
You have been banned from the game. Duration of the ban: #time# minutes If you have questions about the ban, send us an e-mail at #support#
#spielname# is already running in another window.
Unfortunately, the server connection will be interrupted in #time# seconds!
Do you really want to report player {0}?
#name# wants to add you to his/her friends.
Ask #name# if he/she wants to be your friend.
{1} is your {0} friend. In order to delete them you need to end the {0} friendship!
Do you really want to delete #name# from your friends list?
Do you really want to delete #obj#?
We have sent your present to your e-mail address.
We can resend your e-mail if you'd like!
We just sent you an e-mail with your reward!
Expand this building in order to store more items here.
Congratulations! Your farm has grown even bigger.

You must register to save your game. Otherwise your data will be lost!
Registration is free!
Do you want to help #name# harvesting on his/her farm? You'll get XP for any action as reward!
Do you want to help #name# plowing on his/her farm? You'll get Farmdollars for any action as reward!
Ask #name# if he/she wants to harvest on your farm. Whenever someone harvests on your farm you earn more Farmdollars!
Ask #name# if he/she wants to plow on your farm. Whenever someone plows on your farm you get additional XP!
You have unlocked new shop items!
Next level you will unlock the following items:
You have almost made it to the next level. New items will be unlocked soon!
Congratulations! You have reached a new level!
Please enter your e-mail address here, with which you have registered and press 'send'. We will e-mail you your password.
You want to leave the farm?
Please register, so your progress will be saved.
I accept the Terms and Conditions of Use
Hello #name# ! This is the #spielname# market place. Here you can search for jobs or you can hire other players for plowing or harvesting
Block player visits from the ranking list.
Do you really want to sell #obj# for #w1# Farmdollars?
Refresh withered crops with this refresh fertilizer.
Speeds up the growth of plants and trees by 10%
Speeds up the growth of plants and trees by 50%
Speeds up the growth of animals by 10%
Speeds up the growth of animals by 50%
Increases the experience points received from seeds and the harvest of seeds, trees and animals by 50%!
The barn allows you to store 15 objects.
The tool shed allows you to store 4 objects.
The chicken coop allows you to harvest multiple chickens simultaneously.
The piggery allows you to harvest multiple pigs simultaneously.
The cow shed allows you to harvest multiple cows simultaneously.
The horse stable allows you to harvest multiple horses simultaneously.
The silo gives you a 20% bonus on all fertilizer and feed purchases.
Permission to harvest: All finished trees at once.
Permission to harvest: All finished animals at once.
This refiller increases your job energy by {0}.
Premium seeds give more XP and Farmdollars than the common crops, also they can't wither! They can be bought as package deals at the store and can be used straight away without any further costs.
These fuel cans allow you to refuel {0}x.
With the tractor you can plow four fields simultaneously.
With the seeder you can plant four fields simultaneously.
With the harvester you can harvest four fields simultaneously.
With the fertilizer truck you can fertilize four fields simultaneously.
20% extra fuel when purchasing a refill
You don't have enough fuel. Do you want to refill?
You don't have enough fertilizer. Do you want to buy more?
You don't have enough space on your farm. Do you want to expand?
You are out of job energy! Did you know, that you can manually refill it?
You don't have enough premium seeds to perform this action. Would you like to buy some now?
Play Bee Soda an win great prizes!
Do you really want to delete #name# from your farm?
Spring is coming! Don't miss all the new buildings, decorations, animals and trees!
Listen up! Its mooing and cackling on your farm! Have fun with the new sounds in Goodgame Farmer
You can freely chat at the market place from level 10 onwards. At all lower levels, simply use the predefined sentences.
Even more supplies! Prepare yourself for the next wave of new animals, trees, decorations and buildings!
Additionally, we added new levels to all achievements!
Try the new awesome premium seeds! They give more XP and Farmdollars than the common crops and can't wither!
We've also added new seeds for high-level farmers and two new achievements!
Easter is here and it's time to enjoy the wonderful new buildings, decorations, trees and seeds! Have fun on your egg hunt!
The job system has also been reworked. Now you'll only spend job permissions for doing actions, so you'll never come away empty-handed.
Hurry Up! Only a few days remain and the Easter event will be over. We offer a big sale with up to 50% savings for many saisonal items!!!

Summer fashion is here! Get one of the new hats or try the funny easter bunny ears!
And don't forget to check out our new Farmer forum.

Goodgame Farmer has its 1st birthday, time to celebrate with us! Decorate your farm, put on one of those crazy party hats and don't miss the new muffin-seed.
But hurry up, the festivity won't last for long!
Attention! There's a magic wand for success. Use it and your trees, animals and seeds will yield more experience and output.
Your animals are hungry! Feed them so they grow faster! The trees are also wanting to be fertilized.
Goodgame Farmer has been nominated for the European Games Award as „Best Social Game”!
Help us to win by voting for us!
Yarr! The pirates arrived at Goodgame Farmer! Put on a pirate hat, plant the new treasure seed and get a talking parrot!

The latest update caused severe technical difficulties with the conversion of the fertilizer and the achievement rewards.
In order to solve this issue we had to reset all accounts to the previous state.
We are sorry about any inconveniences caused.
Frighten your visitors with spooky Halloween decorations and nightmarish buildings.
Christmas is coming! Don't miss all the new buildings, decorations, trees and seeds!
And to make sure there is always enough open space on your farm, you can now store items in tool sheds and barns!
Another Christmas present for you! Use the brand new ranking to match yourself with other players. Become the best farmer of them all!
Hurry Up! Only a few days remain and the Christmas event will be over. We offer a big sale with up to 50% savings for all saisonal items!!!
This player does not accept friend requests.
Delete that player from your friends list
I accept the Terms and Conditions
Reduce graphics quality to save computer power
The computer will propose a style
You need to invite more {0} friends in order to buy this.
An e-mail should look like this: aaa.bbb@ccc.de
A password contains 5 to 15 characters, consisting of: a-z, A-Z, 0-9, ÄÖÜ,äöü, ß-_@
Job energy: Is used to plow and harvest during jobs on other players farms. As long as your job energy is below {0} it will regenerate new every minute, you can also buy more energy in the shop.
Click, if you forgot your password.
Throw this player off your farm.
Click to read the Terms and Conditions of Use.
You need to build a silo first.
Use this premium seed on your farm.
This player does not want to be visited by using the ranking list.
Add that player to your friends list
Hire that player to harvest on your farm
Go to the farm of this player
Hire that player to plow on your farm
Take a picture of the entire farm
Take a picture chose an area with the rectangle
Take a picture click on an object
Refuel: Click to fill up Display: Number of refills and fuel gauge (maximum {0})
Bring this animal into a stall
All players here on this farm or market place
If you have enough friends, you can expand your farm at a lower price.

Welcome to your own farm!
Let me help you get started, together we will make it flourish beautifully.
Look, your strawberries are ready already! Quick, go and get them.
Reap seeds by clicking on them!
When you harvest plants, you earn Farmdollars and get experience points.
Harvesting gives you Farmdollars and XP!
Now you have to plow your fields in order to plant something new.
Plow fields by clicking on them
Now you can pick out new seeds at the shop!
Buy new seeds at the shop
Click on the fields to sow the wheat there.
Distribute the wheat across the fields

You're doing great! Your farm will soon be the prettiest of all.
Come on, why don't you plant some more?!
Your seeds need a while until completion? Why don't you go to the market place and work for other players?!
You can also go to work!
You get a welcome bonus every day!
You get #w1# Farmdollar as a reward for registering!
You get #w1# Farmdollars as your daily welcome bonus!
You have logged in #days# day/s in a row.
You get #w1# Farmdollars for the activities of the players you have invited.
Tilkoplingen til serveren feilet. Vennligst prøv igjen.

Vi utfører for øyeblikket vedlikeholds arbeid, noe som er nødvendig en gang iblant. For å legge inn oppdateringer eller nye attraksjoner eller for å endre på feil.

Vi jobbber så fort vi kan så du kan spille igjen så fort som mulig.
Hvorfor ikke prøve noen av våre andre spill i mellomtiden?
Du er nå logget ut. Ikke glem: Hver dag er det en innlogging bonus til deg!
Hvis du ikke kan skrive inn tekst, vennligst trykk på Ctrl tasten.
En e-post adresse fra denne leverandøren er ikke tillatt!
Din internett-forbindelse ser ut til å være veldig treg på nåværende tidspunkt. Vennligst prøv igjen senere!
Hvordan liker du spillet og hva kan vi gjøre for å forbedre oss? Vennligst, gi oss din tilbakemelding i Goodgame Forumet eller Gruppen.
Merk: Din utvikling blir bare lagret når du registrerer deg!
Du kan ikke bruke prat-funksjonen på grunn av at du er utestengt.
Du må nå nivå {0} for å chatte!
Du må registrere deg og oppnå nivå 1 for å kunne bruke praten.
Ikke glem: Det er en morsom {0} konkurranse på gang akkurat nå i forumet! Gå dit med én gang og delta på moroa!
Ikke glem: Det er en flott {0} aktivitet på gang akkurat nå i forumet! Du vil definitivt ikke gå glipp av det, så kom deg bort dit med én gang!
Akkurat nå er det en morsom aktivitet på {0} Facebook siden. Sørg for å sjekke det ut!
Grunnet et teknisk problem, kan det være noen forbigående restriksjoner i spillet om {0}. Vennligst se i forumet for detaljer.

Vennligst ikke glem: En ekte ansatt i Goodgame Studios vil aldri spør deg om passordet ditt i spillet! Alltid pass på passordet ditt, og ikke del det ut!
Lykke til i {0}!
En ny oppdatering for {0} er på vei! For de siste nyhetene og info om nye funksjoner og feilrettinger, alltid sjekk forumet!
Om noen få minutter, vil {0} serveren slå seg av midlertidig. Du kan få flere detaljer i forumet.
Uheldigvis er {0} serverene slått av for nød vedlikehold. Du kan finne flere detaljer i forumet.
Ønsker du å legge til {0} som en venn?
Navnet du valgte er ikke lov!
For å invitere venner må du registrere deg først.
Din konto har blitt blokkert! Vennligst kontakt støtte!

Din konto har blitt fryst permanent.
Hvis du har noen spørsmål angående denne blokkeringen, vennligst kontakt støtte.
Skriv inn din E-post adresse og vi vil sende deg ditt passord.
Registrer deg for å lagre spill resultat!
Spillet vil bli tilgjengelig igjen om senest {0}.
Spill serveren er stanset i {0}. Vennligst logg ut eller registrer deg for å lagre ditt resultat.
Vi slår av spill serveren om {0} på grunn av vedlikeholdsarbeid.
Spill serveren er nå stanset. Om noen få minutter, kan du logge deg inn igjen.
Hyggelig å se deg igjen! Her er noe ekstra for å hjelpe deg med å komme deg tilbake på rett spor!
Ditt nye passord har blitt sendt til din e-post adresse.
Beklager, men dette er ikke ditt gamle passord.
Ditt nye passord må ha mer enn 2 karakterer og ditt gamle må være tastet inn riktig!
Ditt passord kan ikkje være tomt eller inneholde spesial karakterer.
Du kan bare forandre ditt passord om du er en registrert spiller!
Bare 48 timer etter registrering - Kjøp utvalgte gull pakker og motta {0}% ekstra Gull gratis!
Bare 48 timer etter registrering - Kjøp gull pakker og motta {0}% ekstra Gull gratis!
Bare i 48 timer etter din registrering - Kjøp {0} pakker og motta {1}% ekstra gratis!
Bare i 48 timer etter din registrering - Kjøp utvalgte {0} pakker og motta {1}% ekstra gratis!
Du blir nå overført til betalings butikken
Kjøp gull nå og motta {0}% bonus!
Kjøp nå {0} og motta en {1} bonus!
Nå kan du få {0}% mer {1} for dine penger
Start øyeblikkelig! Permanent reduserte priser i din betalingsbutikk! Spar ekte penger!
Søk etter en tunnel gjennom internett
Du kan ikke fortsette uten å akseptere vilkårene og betingelsene. Kryss av i boksen ved siden av ''Godta vilkår,'' og du er igang!
Denne brukeren har allerede en avatar.
Du har ikke lov til å bruke {0} i navnet ditt.
Uheldigvis er e-posten din for lang.
E-post adressen du tastet inn er feil.
E-Post adressen kan ikkje være tom eller inneholde mellomrom.
En annen spiller er registrert med denne e-posten, beklager.
Navnet du tastet inn er ugyldig.
Passordet du skrev inn er for kort. Det må inneholde minst 4 tegn.
Passordet du tastet inn er feil.
Ditt passord kan ikke være tomt eller inneholde spesial karakterer.
Vennligst pass på manèrene din er du snill. Ellers kan du risikere å bli utestengt fra praten eller din konto kan bli midlertidig stengt. Grunn: {0}
Du kan ikke bruke prat-funksjonen for dei neste {0} på grunn av gjentatt dårlig oppførsel. Grunn: {1}
Ikke skriv inn URL i praten!
Noen spiller har klaget på deg. Du blir utestengt fra praten for dei neste {0}. Grunn: {1}
Ønsker du virkelig å rapportere spilleren {0}? Husk! Misbruk av denne funksjonen vil resultere i utestengelse av kontoen.
Du har blitt rapportert til administrator av en annen spiller. Grunn: {0}
